content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mister Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student so I don't have a lot of money. I was hoping for a lower price. Maybe around 300 Euros?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 Euros is much lower than my asking price. My apartment is in the city center, and it's newly built. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the quality of the property. How about 500 Euros? It's a very reasonable offer for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 500 Euros is too high for me. I am smart and I am not easily tricked. I know that this apartment is not worth 500 Euros. I will offer 400 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 400 Euros is still lower than what I'm asking for. My apartment is brand new and very close to all amenities. The location alone is worth the extra cost. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of this property. How about we meet in the middle at 450 Euros? It's a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 450 Euros is still too high. I will offer 425 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 425 Euros is closer to my asking price, but it's still not what I'm looking for. This apartment is in high demand, and I'm sure many people would be willing to pay a fair price for it. Let's stick with 450 Euros. It's a very fair offer, considering the location and the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I agree to the price of 430 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept 430 Euros. My apartment is worth more than that. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of a prime location and a brand-new home. How about we meet in the middle at 450 Euros? It's a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I agree to the price of 440 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 440 Euros is closer to my asking price, but it's still not what I'm looking for. This apartment is in high demand, and I'm sure many people would be willing to pay a fair price for it. How about we stick with 450 Euros? It's a very fair offer, considering the location and the quality of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
